title: The moon, the stars, the fish, the beasts, everything prostrates to Allah
transcript: moon the stars and the mountains and the trees and everything that walks the Earth the dawab any living creature Beast Etc whatever and then Allah says and many of mankind and may Allah make me a new among those who prostrate to Allah Allah is saying that we the Believers the Muslims We join hands with the rest of Allah's creation we prostrate to Allah even the snakes prostrate to Allah even the beasts prostrate Allah even the fish in the oceans prostrate to Allah we when we pray we are in unity with this universe worshiping the only Allah foreign
